body.name: Silver Cross Slumber Sleep & Go 3 in 1 Travel Crib - Multi Use, Converts Newborn Bassinet to Crib to Playard - Portable, Lightweight, Easy to Pack with Comfortable Mattress, for Infants to Toddlers
features: THREE-IN-ONE SOLUTION - Slumber Sleep & Go starts as a Newborn Bassinet, grows to a Toddler Crib & transforms into not just a play yard, but your little’s favorite play space thanks to it’s fun zip-up door design. It's lightweight design allows Slumber Sleep & Go to easily go anywhere. From your bedside, to the babysitters & beyond— Slumber lets them sleep all night & play all day.

ULTIMATE COMFORT - The soft yet sturdy mattress is expandable, growing from bassinet size to crib size with baby. The mesh sides provide ventilation and optimal air flow to keep baby cool. The padded frame creates a comfy, safe space for little to sleep & play while the quality, stain resistant fabric feels as good as it looks.

PERFECT FOR HOME & AWAY - All with a simple shake-open set up that packs up just as easily so you can take a piece of home with you—everywhere. The shake open design sets up in a second & folds down easily to fit into the included compact, weatherproof bag. A carry handle and adjustable shoulder strap makes Slumber Sleep & Go’s bag extra-portable and easy to handle.

NEWBORN BASSINET & CRIB - Perfect for newborns, SlumberSleep & Go's sleek styling pairs perfectly with bedroom interiors and can double as a bedside bassinet. Growing child? Slumber Sleep & Go easily transforms by unzipping the bassinet & expanding the mattress to fit the base of the crib. Perfect for overnight sleeping or an afternoon nap.

THE ULTIMATE PLAY YARD - Play time is essential for growing babies, and what better way to facilitate that than by providing a safe, padded area for them to explore? Slumber Sleep & Go lets little ones enjoy their space during the day while the padded sides give parent’s peace of mind. The convenient zip-up door turns up the fun & all into a play space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Newborn Bassinet Slumber starts as a bassinet with a soft yet sturdy expandable mattress, growing from bassinet size to crib size with baby. The bassinet mode is perfect for newborns and can double as a bedside bassinet. Infant Crib Perfect for an afternoon nap and even approved for overnight sleeping, Slumber not only gives little a comfy, safe space to sleep but does so from birth all the way to 50 lbs. Toddler Playard As little grows, simply unzip off the bassinet & expand the mattress to fit the base of the crib. Let little enjoy their space during the day with Slumber's zip-up door that turns up the fun & all into a playspace.

Slumber fits into the included compact, weatherproof bag that sports a carrying handle and adjustable shoulder strap that makes it extra-portable and easy to handle for all of your trips, both near and far.

Easy Open, Easy Close Slumber's shake open design opens in seconds and is simple to pack back up. The padded frame creates a comfy, safe place for little to sleep and play with added peace of mind for you. Expandable Mattress The included soft yet sturdy mattress is expandable, growing from bassinet size to crib size with baby. Covered in soft, yet stain resistant fabric, your baby will feel as great all day and night. Ventilated Mesh Openings Keep your baby boy, or girl, cool and comfortable with the mesh sides that provide ventilation and optimal air flow. You can easily peak in from the sides to check on your little on.

Silver Cross Jet 3 Full Size TSA Approved Infant & Toddler Stroller, Eclipse Silver Cross Jet 3 Full Size TSA Approved Infant & Toddler Stroller, Silver Silver Cross Slumber 3 in 1 Travel Crib in Black Product Description The Jet travel stroller is the only compact stroller in the world with a unique blend of features. Suitable for newborns, infants and toddlers up to 55 lbs,. The Jet 3 has been upgraded with a simple one-motion fold, child-proof and easy to use magnetic Genius buckle, and, for shopping trips or holding baby bags, we added a 20% bigger shopping basket with access from both the front & back of stroller. Slumber starts as a Newborn Bassinet, grows to a Toddler Crib & transforms into not just a play yard, but your little’s favorite play space thanks to it’s fun zip-up door design. Key Features Genius Buckle, 1 Motion Fold, Ultra Lightweight , Compact, Airplane Cabin Approved, Holds Newborns-Children 55 Lbs. Genius Buckle, 1 Motion Fold, Bigger Shopping Basket, Ultra Lightweight , Compact Birth - 50 lbs, Bassinet, Crib, Playpen, Expandable Mattress, Approved for overnight sleeping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the product is amazing. The babies comfortable in it and I love that the mat is has cushion and not flat boards like other play pens. Unfortunately my baby is a butterball so we were a little late and couldn’t use the bassinet part. Easy set up and breakdown. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WISH I HAD THIS WITH MY FIRST BORN!
reviews.reviewText: Sleek, modern and comfortable. The shake-open set up was so easy for me to manage, and there was zero stress when it was time to put away and return to travel bag. This is a must for a baby registry, and/or anyone looking for a high quality travel crib and home play yard. I am so happy with this purchase, and I cannot wait for all the memories that will come with my Silver Cross!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Travel with Baby & Playard MUST
reviews.reviewText: Recieved this week just in time for our spring break vacation and so thankful that we choose Slumber. The travel bag is so nice and easy to carry as it has a shoulder strap, not just a handle & we love that all is included. Super simple to set up & down. We love the fact that when we get home all will both blend in nicely with our home's decor, and also grow with our baby (we have just used the bassinet mode so far but love that all can transform into a crib and playpen design). Highly recommend for both use at home and travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble when everyone is trying to “help” on vacation with family. Great transition for little ones and toddlers. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Travel Crib
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with our purchase. Compared to others I have used with my older daughter, it is much more compact and easier to set up. One thing that sets it apart is the mattress; it is a lot thicker than some of the others we have used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for any new parent!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable!
reviews.reviewText: Love!Love!Love!EverythingAbout it!!!!!No complaints, does not compare to any previous ones I had!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best travel crib
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing travel crib! I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewTitle: If you can afford it, get it!
reviews.reviewText: It is super easy to set up and put away and does not take up much space when travelling.It is the best one on the market at the moment as it is one of two cots on the market that are sleep-rated for the playard section.I previously purchased the Graco Pack 'n Play Travel Dome LX Playard, Ashland ($339.97 originally, but purchased with a deal of the day for $219.99), and that is not sleep-rated for the playard section, and the bassinet is small, especially if your baby is in the 85% percentile of growth. Super annoying to dismantle and feels twice the weight of the Silver Cross Slumber 3-in-1 Travel Crib when packed up.
